content:
She answered the following: “ I am extremely sorry for this project to have taken the wrong direction. Refund is not an issue, but losing a client unsatisfied collides with my life code.
I request you to please close give me a chance, I'll go through all the details one more time and will try my best to come up with the design based on your comments incorporating the best of my skills and design education.” How may I decline politely?
